youtube.title: The Science Behind Feeding Babies Lying Flat | Infant Health Tips
youtube.description: Discover why feeding a baby while they are lying flat can cause milk to come out of their nose. This short biology lesson explains the risks of reflux and the importance of proper positioning during feeding for infant safety and comfort. Subscribe for more health and biology facts!
